bill.title: An Act To Prohibit the Sale or Possession of So-called Bath Salts Containing Dangerous Synthetic Drugs
bill.description: An Act To Prohibit the Sale or Possession of So-called Bath Salts Containing Dangerous Synthetic Drugs

history.action: (H) Committee on Criminal Justice and Public Safety suggested and ordered printed.
(H) The Bill was REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY.
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules On motion by Senator Mason of Androscoggin, REFERRED to the Committee on CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY and ordered printed, in concurrence.
(H) CONSENT CALENDAR - FIRST DAY
(H) Under suspension of the rules
(H) CONSENT CALENDAR - SECOND DAY.
(H) The Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (H-586)
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules Report READ and ACCEPTED in concurrence READ ONCE Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) READ and ADOPTED in concurrence
(S) Under suspension of the Rules, READ A SECOND TIME  PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) in concurrence
(H) PASSED TO BE ENACTED.
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules On motion by Senator ROSEN of Hancock PLACED ON THE SPECIAL APPROPRIATIONS TABLE pending ENACTMENT in concurrence
(S) On motion by Senator ROSEN of Hancock TAKEN FROM THE SPECIAL APPROPRIATIONS TABLE
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Under suspension of the Rules RECONSIDERED  PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) in concurrence
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Under further suspension of the Rules RECONSIDERED ADOPTION of Committee Amendment "A" (H-586)
(S) On further motion by Same Senator Senate Amendment "A" (S-362) to Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) READ and ADOPTED
(S) Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) As Amended By Senate Amendment "A" (S-362) thereto ADOPTED In NON-CONCURRENCE
(S) PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) AS AMENDED BY  Senate Amendment "A" (S-362) thereto In NON-CONCURRENCE
(S) Ordered sent down forthwith for concurrence
(H) On motion of Representative CUSHING of Hampden, TABLED pending FURTHER CONSIDERATION.
(H) Later today assigned.
(H) Unfinished Business
(H) Speaker laid before the House
(H) On motion of Representative WEBSTER of Freeport, the House RECEDED.
(H) Senate Amendment "A" (S-362) to Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) was READ.
(H) On motion of Representative WEBSTER of Freeport, Senate Amendment "A" (S-362) to Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) was INDEFINITELY POSTPONED.
(H) On motion of Representative WEBSTER of Freeport House Amendment "A" (H-676) to Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) was READ and ADOPTED.
(H) Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) as Amended by  House Amendment "A" (H-676) thereto was ADOPTED.
(H) Subsequently, the Bill was PASSED TO BE ENGROSSED as Amended by Committee Amendment "A" (H-586) as Amended by House Amendment "A" (H-676) thereto.
(H) In NON-CONCURRENCE and sent for concurrence.
(H) ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
(S) Under suspension of the Rules On motion by Senator MASON of Androscoggin The Senate RECEDED and CONCURRED To PASSAGE TO BE ENGROSSED AS AMENDED BY Committee Amendment "A" (H-586)
(S) AS AMENDED BY House Amendment "A" (H-676) thereto
(H) PASSED TO BE ENACTED.
(H) ROLL CALL NO. 220 (Yeas 128 - Nays 1 - Absent 21 - Excused 0) (Vacancy 1)
(H) Sent for concurrence. ORDERED SENT FORTHWITH.
